posts.post_content: I was up 20 to 9 against somebody, he threw this out then [Cryptic Command](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cryptic Command) next turn, tapped all my creatures, played two more spells, and had milled me enough *just with this card* to kill me in one turn. A little overpowered?! You don't even need mill to have this be effective.

posts.post_content:
Best Dimir card in the entire block, and synergizes with pretty much any Dimir deck, as a win condition or win-more or game changer. He activates off of the spells you play and the copies of ciphered spells, he is basically a [Lord of Extinction](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lord of Extinction) that gives up counting the cards in its owners graveyard for the ability to pretty much feed itself.   
  
This card is boss. 5/5
